title: Germany

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Perform the Factional Kill
- Torpedo: Deal an Astral Powerful rampage attack. (Costs 8 Gold)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - All Factional Kills while Germany is alive are upgraded to Powerful when a Civ is within two houses of the target. Dead players do not count as houses.

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
“They were shot by a German infantry.” (Factional Kill)
“They were detonated by a torpedo.” (Torpedo)

desc:
Post 2130
*“Open war is better than masked peace.” -German Proverb*
